website_summaries.verdict: Has an extensive list of great features for a sports watch that's also extremely tough.
pros: Water resistant up to 660 ft. Customers love the shock-absorbent features of this watch
Extremely easy to set up and use
cons: Some owners say the display has too many items, leaving a small clock area

website_summaries.verdict: Small, easy-to-use digital watch that presents an affordable option.
pros: A comfortable watch that won't crowd your wrist, and the display can handle low temperatures
Tide and moon display, stopwatch, countdown timer, and auto-calendar are some of the features
cons: The smaller digital screen can be difficult to read

customer_reviews.title: you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Right size, lots of features, nice positive display, low price. Cons: 1. The band holder/retainer does not have the same color as the band. 2. There’s no serial number/manufacture code engraved in the stainless steel case back. 3. The connection of the bands to the watch is loose (not a snug and secure fit). 4. Quality needs to be improved
customer_reviews.author: Lars

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely gorgeous the color red beautiful!!
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about the watch so far...ok so I'm very familiar with Casio type watches!!! it has two 999.999 hour stopwatches in case you need them.. one 24 hour timer... tide and 🌒 window... 4 alarm...one snooze.... 48 city time zones... great red rescue color that just pops with a beautiful red hue deep color...200 meters of water resistant!!! Dislikes are simple wish while in (stop watch) mode the time showed.. second dislike the first mode it goes to is the (tide) mode..wish it was at least stopwatch first and maby the tide mode could be last!! But with all the pluses and $62 bucks it's a small dislike!! Over all beautiful and SIMPLY amazing.. would recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: EDR Jr

customer_reviews.title: Great watch
customer_reviews.text: I was pretty skeptical on buying Gshocks from unknown parties but I did my fair research on fake Gshocks and this rescue red limited edition G7900 is effin dope !!!
customer_reviews.author: JOHNNY

customer_reviews.title: Worn daily, incredibly durable.
customer_reviews.text: In the mud, sand, lake, pond, pool, gravel pits. Dings on heavy equipment, buried, left in water over night, lost and found (alarm). This is the best watch I have ever owned. Once, the buttons were stuck shut from too much dirt and grime, let it soak in warm dishwater over a night and it just works.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: I love this watch
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch! I’m a female bartender and would highly recommend getting this watch. I always got cheap watches knowing I would ruin them eventually at work but decided to try this one out and it has been wonderful! Love all the alarms on it and I can look at it and see the day date and time...I never take it off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rescue Red G-Shock, awesomeness
customer_reviews.text: The color (Rescue Red) is bright, which is what I want. The screen is clear with an easy-to-see digital display. The light works great and is bright. My only complaint is the initial setup. I have many G-Shocks and the tide/moon function took me a while to figure out. I have a few from the G-Lide lineup and those do it automatically. But once I did it works as advertised. You will need to know your longitude and latitude along with the UTC so have a smartphone handy during your initial set up.
customer_reviews.author: Mozzberg

customer_reviews.title: Do you want a big red watch?
customer_reviews.text: Because this is a big red watch. I bought it mainly for two qualities: 1) its redness, and B) its bigness. Okay, and while I don't really need them, I think the moon phase and tide tracking are pretty cool. Honestly, for me the most useful feature is probably world time. Anyway, the watch is rugged (a couple weeks ago I wiped out on my bike and the only damage to the watch was a few scratches on the band) and comfortable (probably due to the light weight and those wings).
customer_reviews.author: Shrimp Flavored Chips

customer_reviews.title: Ok, not so great a watch!  Waterproof 200m my tail!!
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: After less then 4 months of ownership this watch started to fog over on the inside. This is from Florida private pools (nothing else was open until just recently). The photo pretty well shows all. Expensive PoS. ORIGINAL IMPRESSION WHEN BOUGHT: I do really like this watch. It is smaller print then I prefer, but the independent light switch on its face helps a lot. Did a weird thing though. Seemed to correct itself for daylight savings time (great!). Then about a week or three later it was back to the wrong time?!? Not sure what that was about. Was fairly simple to correct.
customer_reviews.author: Milamber

customer_reviews.title: so far so good
customer_reviews.text: I have this for 3 weeks already. Its quite useful for my trip to Japan, where everything's on time. Better than checking and draining the battery on my cellphone. The red is really nice and is a true red. The digital readout is legible and not too small. The light should stay on just one second longer I think. The watch is not too bulky but is tall and catches the strap of my backpack when I take it on and off. After daily use in the grimy streets and subways, the finish has gotten dulled and dirty. I will attempt to clean it.
customer_reviews.author: Alan F. Paredes

customer_reviews.title: Elegant Masculinity
customer_reviews.text: Recieved this Casio G7900 for Christmas from my lovely wife and I love it more than I thought I would. When set using UTC offset, Lunitidal-Interval and correct Longitude, this oceanic operations watch will give accurate moon phase and fairly accurate tide prediction. I highly recommend this watch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement for my 8 year old G-shock
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch because my other watch kept freezing and fogging up when going from hot (75 degrees) to cold (28 degrees). I am a life long g-shock customer and this watch is no different in terms of quality and build. I hardly take take the watch off unless I'm going to a fancy dinner and want to wear something more fancy. I get constant compliments, as the red does draw attention, but it is not a bright red, I would consider this a true red/ varsity red. As always once it gets worn, it looks better! Good reliable watch that wont freeze in cold temperatures.
customer_reviews.author: D. Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: G-Shock watch
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch in red for my boyfriend last Christmas and I don’t think he’s gone a day without wearing it. It’s been almost a year. The color is a true red, it’s a little hard for us to set it off of military time so we took it to the watch guy (ahaha) and I think at 62 yrs old it would be easier for him to read if it were not digital BUT he loves it and can see it fine. He doesn’t even go in the water at the beach but loves that feature ...Thinking of purchasing it in another color for him this year.
customer_reviews.author: Lanette Pulizzi

customer_reviews.title: Nice and strong watch ! I can never have too many !
customer_reviews.text: I have been a Casio fan my whole life. I love G-Shock because I have literally seen how durable and strong they are over the years .. I have owned Maybe over 40 . As I used to collect them when I was younger. Red is my favorite color so why not lol . Great product and people when you have problems with one . They have a great warranty also .
customer_reviews.author: Josh & Sav

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch
customer_reviews.text: It’s a rather large-faced watch (which I like) with perhaps too many features for my needs. Well-built and well-designed. My only complaint is that while in chrono mode, it doesn’t show the time of day, which I rely on when in the gym. Instead, it shows ST1 or ST2 for split times. Handy for a runner, but not practical for the gym as I was constantly switching through 7 modes to check the time of day/night. I guess I’ll just wear this as my “beat-up” watch, i.e., day-to-day activities. I thought I’d me more keen of the red color, but learned the hard way I prefer white (like my other Casio).
customer_reviews.author: Mark Twain

customer_reviews.title: Rescue Red
customer_reviews.text: Just received this watch today and couldn’t be happier. This is an awesome 😎 Gshock watch with amazing functions with tide and moon phase along with other multifunction features. The color is beyond fantastic and seeing in person is so much better than pics . Strongly recommend Gshock as I also own the solar Gshock Mudman 9300 which is another home run as well.
customer_reviews.author: huggie bear

customer_reviews.title: Great watch, replacement band too much though.
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch!! Its a big beefy beast!! Typical G shock quality! I am still baffled as to how a replacement band for it cost more than the entire watch... thus the 3 stars. The band alone currently goes for about 70 bucks alone. How does that work??
customer_reviews.author: sophers

customer_reviews.title: Quality Watch
customer_reviews.text: I bought the both the red and black versions of this Casio watch. I wear the black one on the job and the red one off. I like the features of the model even though I may not use all the features. I like the countdown timer and stop watch features. Everything else is nice to have if needed even if I rarely tap the full potential of this watch. This is my second G-Shock. My first one is on the bottom of the Indian Ocean. All in all I would recommend this model. I really like the matte red finish. The jury is still out on how well it will clean up when it gets dirty. We shall see!
customer_reviews.author: camanosflower

customer_reviews.title: a great pcs but ya gotta learn the operations and I ...
customer_reviews.text: a great pcs but ya gotta learn the operations and I was not able to set the time and tide the way I needed it set, I am in between Anchorage and Seattle and so far the pcs wont let me set the tide for latitude or the day for time but am working on it, and this is my second and am not parting with this pcs...... I open and close door a hundred times a day sometimes 7 days a week but always 6 days a week and it has not complained in 17 years. try that on for size....
customer_reviews.author: Richard Burr

customer_reviews.title: This is a great watch!
customer_reviews.text: I'm completely satisfied with this purchase. initially, i was looking to replace a broken watchband, the worn face bezel and two missing bolts from the bezel of a Casio Multiband 6 - totaling almost $55 in parts. For about ten to twelve dollars more, I decided on this watch, which was new and wouldn't need repair work. Glad I did - the red accents make it stand out and it has the same functions as the piece I was looking to repair. Get this watch if you're looking for a multi-functional timepiece that looks really nice on your wrist.
customer_reviews.author: jameshardin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Everyday Wear!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this red G-Shock for my husband because he loved his first one, same exact style but in black, so much he never takes it off. That’s a good testament to how comfortable they are and the tide feature and ability to go in deep water is great for beach lovers and people who love water activities like we do. G-Shocks are stylish, durable & useful for day to day wear. I have a Baby G (girl version) and love mine with tide chart as well! Would highly recommended to everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Loves2Shop

customer_reviews.title: Fiance Loves It!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my fiance as he has wanted a G-Shock watch for a while. He really likes the bright red color of it and is enjoying how easy it is to read the watch. It was easy for him to set up and was able to quickly maneuver the watch and settings on it. Works like a charm for him, and he did check to see how legit this watch was, as he does become doubtful about the authenticity of the items from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Carolina

customer_reviews.title: Recently purchased two essential oil diffuser and I love the ease of use and how great my home ...
customer_reviews.text: Recently purchased two essential oil diffuser and I love the ease of use and how great my home smells! However, even after pressing timer four times for maximum running time the units will stop when there is plenty of water. Received great service from , sent two new units and they work perfectly. Wonderful customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Yilu Zhu

customer_reviews.title: Big watches for small problems
customer_reviews.text: It's like strapping a microwave to my wrist. How big do these watches need to be built these days??
customer_reviews.author: Nelson C. Burns

customer_reviews.title: Rescue Red G-Shock
customer_reviews.text: This Rescue Red G-Shock has a well named color. Bright screaming red. I love it with black outfits. It's just like my Blue & Orange G-Shock but red. Comfortable to wear with the little flaps that come out under the strap from the strap hinges. The tide and moon functions are cool.
customer_reviews.author: BH

customer_reviews.title: Nice Watch
customer_reviews.text: A great watch, it's comfortable, practicable, and best of all the price. It is my first G-Shock so can't compare to other G-Shocks, but as far as other watches, I like this one most of all. Being a Georgia Bulldog fan, the colors are excellent, right down to the G on the dial. GO DAWGS!
customer_reviews.author: ScottyH

customer_reviews.title: That Red Touch
customer_reviews.text: You always want something different instead of the everyday (Black)G-Shocks. When I go running or balling I always wear Blue,Green or Red clothing. I purchased this for the red combinations. I don't know I just like being different, don't judge me lol. The watch was packaged really good, looks great and attracts a lot of eyes because like I said before its different everyone is used to seeing black. I'm more use to the hard glossy types of G-Shocks but the rubber feels hardened so there's no HUGE difference. Great eye grabbing watch, purchase it if you wouldn't mind the slight rubber feel. THAT INSTRUCTION BOOKLET don't get rid of it, new G-Shock owners will need it for awhile.
customer_reviews.author: Rell

customer_reviews.title: No disapointments
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the black version as my surf watch about a year ago. Lost it out in the water a week ago. Some snorkeler will probably find it and score. I liked it so much I purchased the red version as a replacement
customer_reviews.author: 808 Illustrator

customer_reviews.title: A Bit too complicated
customer_reviews.text: It takes toooo much to set up the UTC, for the moon and tidea and Longitude, etc. It would be much more usefull if there were a website that Casio set up to put in your CITY and then it gave you all the settings. It keeps time nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen DiGiacomo

customer_reviews.title: Great watch for my small son
customer_reviews.text: What can you say, it is a G-Shock. This G7900 version is rugged, has a wider band than the cheaper G-Shocks and even includes protector plates where the bands join to the watch case to increase band lifespan.The watch obviously keeps the time and date, but also includes a second time listing and a stopwatch. The large G button on the face activates the night light and makes the watch that more useful. I ordered this in the bright red color and it looks awesome on my small son. I cannot think of a nicer, more attractive or more rugged watch in this price range for a small boy. Five stars in my book.
customer_reviews.author: A. Aurelius

customer_reviews.title: A watch that will last.
customer_reviews.text: Love this watch. I have owned it for over 8 years. I bought it from amazon. It is sturdy as all heck. I’ve only replaced the battery 3 times, I believe. Many of those years I wore the watch everyday and the only thing to give was the plastic loop that holds the strap slack. The red is a nice flat red too.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Nice durable watch that’s easy to read
customer_reviews.text: Very clear and easy to read. Red is my favorite color and this is a great red. The world time option is nice if you travel sometimes. This is a little big and clunky, which was the g-shock style for some time. If that’s not appealing you might not like this.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy in Seattle

customer_reviews.title: Features and price can't be beat!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent watch, perfect for someone who is out fishing or boating a lot with its moon and tide feature and water resistant for scuba diving. The best part is red color which is eye-catching but not too much attention. I also like the bright green backlight (not a light on a side) and the auto light on feature at the flick of wrist glance. Did I mention the price? Best price for a feature-packed watch on Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: A Customer

customer_reviews.title: My new gshock
customer_reviews.text: In Perfect condition as describe love very well made doesn’t feel cheap good quality and feels very comfortable on my wrist a must have watch
customer_reviews.author: Jason Olavarria

customer_reviews.title: Great watch!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this watch. I wear it to the pilll everyday! Positively water proof.
customer_reviews.author: M C H

customer_reviews.title: Great watch
customer_reviews.text: Already had one, got this one for everyday wear and the last one is still with me after work in construction and heavy lifting. I've had that for 4 years now worrying freeway just need to adjust the time every 2months or so gets behind about 15 sec
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Watch Almost Rottweiler Proof!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought this exact watch twice. My Rottweiler literally ate my old one. The watch still worked. The screen was cracked and the buttons were missing. Very reliable watch. Can be difficult to set up and get use to the button sequence. I’m sure if I used the directions it would of been much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous235

customer_reviews.title: Very nice watch its accurate on its moon phase readings good ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice watch its accurate on its moon phase readings good color the light is very nice easy to read in the dark has the a.el function is really cool tilt the watch twords you and the light turns on you can turn this off when it's not needed i havnt used the tide function yet only thing is the band I usually like the double hole clasp but this is still nice
customer_reviews.author: Benito camelo

customer_reviews.title: So farmm I LOVE it!!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful piece! My wrist is only 5.75 inches, but it fits me, and it looks GOOD! I have had it one hour. I have not figured out how to use the backlight, yet, But, It was easy to program! It's bright, tough, and chunky!
customer_reviews.author: K. Sprowl

customer_reviews.title: Good watch, worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I wear it all day, every day. It's a great watch. The instruction booklet only came with a few location presets, though--none of which were near me. I live in Fresno, CA, and the only West Coast locations were Seattle, WA and Baja, Mexico. I found the lunartidal data for Monterey, CA online and set it to that. It took maybe 5mins. The face is easy to read and the illuminator is bright.
customer_reviews.author: Treburg Navek

customer_reviews.title: It keeps time.
customer_reviews.text: Great watch, I've been wearing it everyday at work and home. Very rugged and durable I've snatched it on hard corners and the straps did not break, I thought it might be too big (I wear my watch with the face on the inside of my wrist) but it's pretty comfortable and you forget you're wearing it fast. The actual glass face is inset pretty deep which helps to keep you from cracking or scratching the screen. However the resin the watch is made out of picks up dirt and discolors quickly and does clean up easily
customer_reviews.author: Keith Miskell

customer_reviews.title: Perfect & stylist
customer_reviews.text: My grandson’s 14th birthday gift. Fits great, nice color. Looks really good on his small wrist. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: SHARON E

customer_reviews.title: Do I need another G Shock?  Yes.
customer_reviews.text: Have a G Shock but liked the red color of this one. Added bonus the screen is much better. Separate for day, time, and date.
customer_reviews.author: Dean

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Easy to set. Can’t go wrong with a G Shock watch! I have a couple older ones from the 1990’s and they’re still going strong and wear them a lot still!!!
customer_reviews.author: Abbey

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with the
customer_reviews.text: Pleased with the watch! This is the third G shock I own and I have always been happy with the product. My only comments are that the Tide line on top of the face could be a little smaller so that the watch time would be more apparent. Also, being battery operated, when the battery needs to be changed it has to be done professionally so that the water resistant feature is maintained
customer_reviews.author: John J Volk

customer_reviews.title: This watch Rocks !!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch !!! I recieved it as a Christmas gift 4 years ago and it was an all time best. G Shocks rock so don't hesitate buying this. I primarily wear this as a work watch "EMT" but also for outdoor adventures. My other watch is a Tag Heur that I love as well. Haven't changed battery yet.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: he loves it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband and he loves it. Gets lots of compliments on it. It's a nice statement watch
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: I collect nice watches!!!
customer_reviews.text: I collect nice watches!!! and this was a must because I have many dress watches and is great to have a nice watch to go play in!!!!
customer_reviews.author: D'LoEros DaKiqueeng

customer_reviews.title: It was a great buy, I bought this for my boyfriend and ...
customer_reviews.text: It was a great buy, I bought this for my boyfriend and he wears it all the time. Due to his job he cannot have a smart watch. The features on here include tides, alarms, time, stop watch, date and day of the week. It has been able to stand him in the water with it on as well. Casio is a really great brand and it lives up to its durable and reliable expectations. Oh! and the Red is very nice.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonConnoisseur

customer_reviews.title: Awesome time piece
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas gift but decided to give it to him early he absolutely loves it
customer_reviews.author: Cookie

customer_reviews.title: Great watch!
customer_reviews.text: One of the better G Shocks I have owned especially since the buttons are raised and easy to use unlike other G Shocks where the buttons are set inside the casing and are almost impossible to use at least quickly.
customer_reviews.author: JBC

customer_reviews.title: Very, very nice.
customer_reviews.text: Agree with all the good stuff said. Really like the watch for all the reasons stated previously. Only a couple of nit-picky items: 1) The count-down timer does not allow seconds to be set. Not a really big deal, but I was hoping it would like my other G-Shock. 2) Really, really nit-picky: I was hoping that the red color would be a bit more vibrant. It's not dull by any means, and does not detract from the functionality or style. All in all, money well spent.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Saunders

customer_reviews.title: I am glad I made the purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch. Features help me keep on schedule at work. I watched a YouTube video on how to set it. The moon and tide feature makes it fun to keep track of their progress. I might even rebut this watch in a different color bc I love g shock.
customer_reviews.author: Johnnie Win-Win

customer_reviews.title: What, you got me this cool watch, you're the best!!
customer_reviews.text: For my grandson for Christmas. Red is his favorite color and if for any reason this watch is not well received, I have a lovely wrist that can wear it. I think this watch is awesome and I'm just messing around, I think he's really going to flip when he sees it.
customer_reviews.author: Raven Beauty

customer_reviews.title: Love it - Great color
customer_reviews.text: Love this one. I have a few of G shocks. The red is a nice red. Get it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love it, G-Shock make great long lasting work watches. I just retired my old G-Shock watch that I've had for ten years and it still works great. I'm a commercial electrician so it takes a beating
customer_reviews.author: Thomas A. Overstreet

customer_reviews.title: Loved the watch in the beginning but its so huge ...
customer_reviews.text: Loved the watch in the beginning but its so huge on hand that it hits objects. On the other hand when paired with certain outfits it looks nice for casual wear. In the office, when wearing dress clothes it looks horrible because it sticks out. The matte red paint seems to get dirty quickly... And it cant be cleaned off, it just darkens the outside. Its ok, but I would buy G-Shock again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Plastic!
customer_reviews.text: I am giving this watch a 4 star due to the wrist band is made out of plastic and rubber! Casio use to make a really good watch band when it first came out! And, it seems that most of their watch bands are made out of plastic! Which are not very comfortable to wear!
customer_reviews.author: snake St paul, MN

customer_reviews.title: Tough enough for my kid
customer_reviews.text: My son begged me for this watch for a long time. We found the best prices on Amazon. So far the watch has been a solid performer. It has held up to the rigor of my son who is 10 years old. He loves all the features and functions, especially the moon and tide indicators.
customer_reviews.author: jlehr

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Still getting compliments about this watch after 2 years! I only wear it during Summer because I call it my Hot Weather watch. Most comments are from women, which surprises me. Women pick up the red color or, perhaps, are attracted to men wearing red watched? I have 5 Casio watched, and a Rolex two tone (white 18k bezel with gold links), never once someone said something about my Rolex. So I handed that watch down to my son when he turned 18.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony N. Monti

customer_reviews.title: This is bright and great looking and he's received many compliments
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband for Father's Day and he loves it. He had a similar watch for 10 years and it finally wore out. This is bright and great looking and he's received many compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch
customer_reviews.text: Love this watch the color, the size everything is perfect highly recommended if your looking for a bright watch
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Daniel Perez Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Good value. Tough. Perfect for outdoors activities like backpacking or surfing.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a watch addict. I have several TAG's, Tissot's and other higher end watches. I got the G-Shock for the outdoor activities I do where I wanted something I could beat up without worry. It's great for backpacking. I like the little moon and tide readings which are fun when I'm on the coast in Oregon or Washington. It is bulky but I am OK with that style and knew that was what I was getting. Good watch for the price.
customer_reviews.author: TheBGH

customer_reviews.title: Awesome G-shock!
customer_reviews.text: Great watch at a Good price! I'm a collector so I probably won't get to wear it much at all.......but it looks good in my collection 😎
customer_reviews.author: Tony Stark

customer_reviews.title: Rugged good looking watch
customer_reviews.text: I love my strong,reliable go to Casio watches! The red is a nice bright shade,perfect for summer outfits.As always,the buttons are easy to work for display adjusting & there are plenty of wrist band holes to fit any size wrist.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for diving AND daily use
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch! got it for diving as the old one stopped working. I like it so much that I don't even notice sometimes that I use it on a daily basis for some rough work where a common/cheaper watch would not make the cut. The watch came on its original case, so the watch made it safely to my hands. I definitely recommend this watch for diving AND daily use.
customer_reviews.author: Chykityta

customer_reviews.title: Tough, attractive watch
customer_reviews.text: Tough watch has stood up to punishment that has broken other watches. Light weight & attractive. Great price (much less than it was offered for on a cruise ship at supposed cut rate price).
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth G

customer_reviews.title: This is a great timepiece!
customer_reviews.text: This watch has the solid G-Shock quality Casio has come to be known for. Accurate, tough, and it looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: G Shock red rescue watch
customer_reviews.text: I got this for mountain biking with my 3 year old. Needed to know how much time it took us to get where we at so we could get back before dark. And I needed my split times while running. My 3 year old likes to play with it and loves the moon function and when we do the Pacific Coast Highway ill explain the high tide function. And guess what...my 3 year old can't break it. Ive had this g shock in black before so I thought I would step it up a bit with the red. It stands out. You can't miss with this watch. If you want to go low budget get the black one.
customer_reviews.author: j.r. rader

customer_reviews.title: Awesome watch, looks sick in red.
customer_reviews.text: I had a red G7900 for about 3 years and gave it some serious abuse, before part of the strap started to fail. It went diving with no problems, got covered in oil based mud on drilling rigs on a regular basis, survived -40C in the arctic with no real trouble (screen got a little fuzzy once). I love this watch. The bright red colour does fade a bit with time, but it still looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Dave C

customer_reviews.title: Love the watch
customer_reviews.text: Lots to say about it. First of all the design. The red and black color with the big screws make it look bulky , but its light. Second, battery life. I've had it for 6+ months so far and still don't see any difference. Next, display. I can see it clearly and vivid. It shows time, moon phase, date etc. It also shows time from other cities. There's nothing I hate about the watch. It withstands basic water washes, cold fridgit weathers.I made a good choice
customer_reviews.author: Nehal

customer_reviews.title: Dirty
customer_reviews.text: The watch is good for the money and it's functions work well. The only complaint is that it will get filthy in no time at all just from normal wear and use.
customer_reviews.author: Rob_B

customer_reviews.title: Not even %80 percent accurate tides and lunar data
customer_reviews.text: Tide and Lunar date is not accurate, as well as the watch being very difficult to set up at first.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Any better it would be made of BACON!
customer_reviews.text: If it were a solar model it were be almost perfect as a skin diver's watch. The band is too short to be used with wetsuit sleeves and the watch display doesn't differentiate between lunar and solar tides. All that being said, it is a really nice sports watch that meets my warm water scuba needs. I'll look for a better solar model with a long band to use here on the NC ship wrecks.
customer_reviews.author: B.ill

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: A little hard to initially set up, but one of the best watches I’ve ever had
customer_reviews.author: Mar

customer_reviews.title: It’s a good watch. Only one thing
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good watch. Only one thing, I wishe the font size would be larger. I will never buy a watch like this unless it has hands.
customer_reviews.author: DanielC22

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to set
customer_reviews.text: It just came in the mail after 2 days, love the weight of it, and the color, like someone else said the instructions are way too small to read, was very easy to set time and date. I would recommend this watch to anyone, looking for a sturdy good looking watch!
customer_reviews.author: Paul wedding

customer_reviews.title: Very good watch, but be aware it uses tide algorithm
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and does what it's suppose to do. IRL the finish is matte, which I prefer to shinny. The only thing to be aware of is that this uses a tide estimation algorithm, not actual tide data, and so you have to program it and even then the accuracy isn't perfect (but on the plus side, it can estimate tides indefinately vs 10-years or however long other watches save data for). All-in-all exceeded my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: joeydeeez

customer_reviews.title: Very good looking watch
customer_reviews.text: I love how it looks on my hand. Very cool watch for outdoor activities and going to the gym.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Bogdan

customer_reviews.title: A handsome and functional Casio.
customer_reviews.text: Not only does it look like a Lego toy and professional equipment it works like a Casio. The big display is easy to read. It illuminates well at night with the push button. I like the tide and moon phase information as I live on an island. As always there are no worries if you swim or wash with it. Even if you lose it it shouldn't spoil a vacation. You could buy a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Greenberg

customer_reviews.title: Bright red
customer_reviews.text: The color is bright red, I love it. It is easy to use, I am very satisfied with this watch.
customer_reviews.author: Tania

customer_reviews.title: Casio G Shock's have been my husband's favorite watch since our college days
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift for my teenage son. Casio G Shock's have been my husband's favorite watch since our college days. Glad to share the watch love with our son.
customer_reviews.author: Velvetdogmom

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my boyfriend and he's completely in love with it, has not failed up to this point, provides so much information and is definitely water resistant, the color is vibrant and he tells me is very comfortable to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as pictured and described. I bought it as a gift for my husband and he loved it. This watch fits large wrists perfectly and comfortably!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica J.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Watch!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second G-Shock and by far my favorite! The moon phase, tide graph, and time, stand out and are easy-to-read. Everything on the watch's face makes sense. The moon/tide graphs on other G-Shocks look smaller, harder-to-read. Nothing about this watch disappoints. I've worn it for 4 weeks. It's comfortable, attractive and feels good on the wrist. Rich, red color.
customer_reviews.author: Porter

customer_reviews.title: Really good watch!
customer_reviews.text: I had this watch for a long time but i returned it for a smartwatch. none the less a very good watch!
customer_reviews.author: ZaidProductions

customer_reviews.title: Casio and a Great Price
customer_reviews.text: My college football team's colors are red and white. I bought this color Casio so that I could wear during home and away ball games. Gotta support the team. Plus it has lots of usable functions.
customer_reviews.author: DPS

customer_reviews.title: I really like thiswatch
customer_reviews.text: I really like this watch. It's accurate and the color really pops! It has two wings on the inside of the band that makes it way more comfortable than any other Casio G shock I've ever worn, which are numerous. Great comfort, great price, and all around great buy for me. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Louis R. Larsen

customer_reviews.title: User friendly!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my husband, and he loves it. So easy to use, even he figured it out LOL!
customer_reviews.author: Kristy

customer_reviews.title: Im in love with this watch
customer_reviews.text: Im in love with this watch. I like how the red has a matte feel to it. Recommend it to every G Shock wearer and if you are in doubt hope this helps you change your mind.
customer_reviews.author: MattAlbuka2

customer_reviews.title: G7900 Red Rescue!
customer_reviews.text: Lovely watch! nice red matte finish looks great. Light green lume real visible at night. Same size numbers as my 9400-1 and my G-56. Easy recommendation! Male or female looks super. Comfortable soft rubber strap (poly) Wrist levelers are comfy! Amazon ships quickly and securely.
customer_reviews.author: The.sheepdog

customer_reviews.title: Solid watch but...
customer_reviews.text: The watch is great. I like all the features, but the numbers are too small for the size of the watch face and it’s just too thick. Gets caught on everything. Lastly, I don’t like the tide feature. It’s tough to set up and doesn’t work well
customer_reviews.author: Matt C

customer_reviews.title: Favorite watch
customer_reviews.text: A G-shock is never a disappointment ... Always a great watch. We do everything in them including swimming. They are very durable and reliable. This one has a matte red finish and looks great on your arm.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My life is easier
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch! The Casio brand is excellent for my EMT career! I love the flash of the red and all the modes that come with the watch. It makes my life easier!
customer_reviews.author: Weston

customer_reviews.title: Great watch
customer_reviews.text: I have had this watch for a week. And so far it is the best g-shock I’ve ever had and I’ve used g-shock for 15 years
customer_reviews.author: Sharon C.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Boyfriend loved it for his birthday! Very nice looking and durable. He never takes it off and it’s super waterproof! He’s washed out car done the dishes and given the kids baths with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah c

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I expected....
customer_reviews.text: So as an owner of other G-shock watches I knew what type of quality to expect. The watch is nice looking as the image shows and nothing stands out to make me not want this watch. If I pressed myself really hard to come up with something it would probably be that it's a digital display only, I personally like the analog dials but that is just personal preference. I highly recommend this watch!
customer_reviews.author: Sal from Eastvale, CA

customer_reviews.title: Just Arrived
customer_reviews.text: usps just dropped this off. i am no genius when it comes to setting things up, but this watch was very easy. As someone else suggested...just go the Casio website and use the correct model instructions...much easier and you can see it better than the tiny instructions included...Awesome watch for a 7" wrist (small)....So far I LOVE this watch...and I have Rolex, Nomos, Ball and Stowa watches....
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Gillis

customer_reviews.title: packaged nicely. Didn't quite understand how to set up the ...
customer_reviews.text: I received the watch when I expected to. packaged nicely. Didn't quite understand how to set up the longitude and lunar settings. Fortunately I was able to call customer service and they held my hands through the process of finalizing the watch set up. Very attractive time piece.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Hilliard

customer_reviews.title: works fine. If it gets dirty
customer_reviews.text: I have been a fan of G-Shock watches for a long time. The main reason is the durability, it’s a watch you can bang around and not worry about. I have another G-Shock that I’ve had for almost 7 years and it still has the original battery, works fine. If it gets dirty, wear it next time you go swimming, especially in a chlorinated pool. It’s not a fancy watch, yet it looks great and certainly gets looks.
customer_reviews.author: Radu Munteanu

customer_reviews.title: perfect tough watch
customer_reviews.text: needed a watch tgat counts seconds for EMS, as well as being able to resist harsh conditions and be easy to clean. this watch does all of that perfectly, and the tide monitor is awesome for surfing
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: G-Shock G-Rescue Series Red Dial Men's Watch G-7900A
product_meta.description:
If Bold is you're style, then G-Shock's Rescue Concept casual watches are totally your thing. The bright red of this watch is enough to catch anyone's eye. Use them as a sport watch or for everyday use, the choice is yours. But with their shock resist and water resist power - how can you resist?




PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Is Discontinued By Manufacturer :No
 * Product Dimensions :1 x 1 x 1 inches; 1.55 Ounces
 * Item model number :G7900A-4
 * Department :Watches
 * Batteries :1 Lithium Metal batteries required. (included)
 * Date First Available :October 21, 2009
 * Manufacturer :Casio
 * ASIN :B00284ADEE

 * Amazon Best Sellers Rank: #31,978 in Sports & Outdoors (See Top 100 in Sports & Outdoors)  *  #41 inMen's Outdoor Recreation Sport Watches 
    *  #284 inMen's Wrist Watches 
    *  #47 inMen's Sport Watches 
   
   

 * Customer Reviews:4.8 out of 5 stars1,429 ratings If Bold is you're style, then G-Shock's Rescue Concept casual watches are totally your thing. The bright red of this watch is enough to catch anyone's eye. Use them as a sport watch or for everyday use, the choice is yours. But with their shock resist and water resist power - how can you resist?
feature_bullets: Made in the USA or Imported
Shock-resistant sport watch featuring moon/tide graphs, low temp LCD, auto EL backlight, flash alert, world time, and daily alarm
Also includes chronograph with 12 and 24-hour formats
50 mm resin case with mineral dial window
Japanese quartz movement with digital display
Red resin band with buckle closure
Water resistant to 200 m (660 ft): In general, suitable for professional marine activity and serious surface water sports, but not scuba diving
